title: Headline used in the book Secrets of the Great Pyramid by Peter Tompkins, 1971
content:
Here are three samples from the book 'Secrets of the Great Pyramid' by Peter Tompkins.  
Published by Harper & Row Publishers, New York, Copyright 1971.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415000533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20sample_5095.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415000533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20sample%202_6673.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415000533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20sample%203_6113.jpg)

Any help with identifying this font would be great.
author: GeClark
